<chara 632><lf><voice V0621_011><lf>Ah, wait. There's something I want to give you.
<chara 632><lf>I know you came to the Empyrean to take<lf>the throne and become the new ruler...
<chara 632><lf><voice V0621_013><lf>But the choices you've made really show your<lf>devotion, and how you won't be misled by others.
<chara 632><lf>With that kind of conviction, I believe<lf>you can create a truly beautiful world.
<chara 632><lf><voice V0621_012><lf>As the Goddess, I want to give you<lf>my blessing... Here, take this.
The goddess offered something to you. It suddenly emits<lf>a burst of light and is quickly absorbed into your being.

<chara 617><lf><voice dev249_vo_79><lf>It is said that the path to God reflects the hearts<lf>of those who walk it. Tell me, what do you see?
<chara 617><lf>Is it a twisted, wayward path? Or is it straight<lf>and narrow, one that won't lead you astray?
<chara 617><lf><voice dev249_vo_75><lf>Either way, I, Melchizedek, shall<lf>judge whether you are fit to rule!

<chara 617><lf>Can your soul surpass theirs, I wonder?

<chara 502><lf><voice V0621_011><lf><pc_given>... can I get a moment? Before you<lf>take the throne, I want to talk about<lf>the world you're going to create.
<chara 502><lf>...The thing is, after awakening as a goddess,<lf>my old self should have faded away.<lf>Since it's not really necessary for my duty.
<chara 502><lf><voice V0621_012><lf>But I still feel like... me.<lf>I'm still Tao Isonokami.
<chara 502><lf>I think it's because of all the time I spent<lf>with you and Yoko... Traveling through Da'at<lf>together helped me feel so much stronger.
<chara 502><lf><voice V0621_011><lf>...I want to save the people who<lf>are suffering in this broken world.
<chara 502><lf>I think I know the source of all of that suffering, too.<lf>It's because the Creator made the world this way.
<chara 502><lf>...So we have to make our own world. A more<lf>perfect world, where no one is doomed to suffer.
<chara 502><lf>A world where all of humanity's dreams can<lf>come true. I know we can make it a reality.
Can we really do it?
It'll be hard.
<chara 502><lf><voice V0621_012><lf>If anyone can, it's you, <pc_given>.
<chara 502><lf>Yeah, for sure... It won't be simple,<lf>but it's not impossible.
<chara 502><lf>With all these different lives and different perspectives,<lf>it won't be easy to make everyone happy.
<chara 502><lf>And as the new ruler, you'll need to watch over           <lf>your people and guide them. For a long, long time.
<chara 502><lf>But I think that's a price worth paying, right?<lf>If it means no more suffering in the world,<lf>I'll do whatever I have to.
<chara 502><lf>And I would watch over this new world<lf>at your side. If you want that.
<chara 502><lf><voice V0621_012><lf>So... will you help me make my vision<lf>a reality? Let's both do all we can<lf>to make our ideal world real, <pc_given>.

<chara 503><lf><voice E0631003_0020><lf>We should take care not<lf>to let them get too far.

<chara 255><lf><voice E0640003_1320><lf>We've been ordered to track down the lair of<lf>the demon king. We cannot fail Archangel Abdiel.

<chara 506><lf><voice E0650001_0060><lf><pc_family>, look at you!<lf>You made it all this way!
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650002_0130><lf>Does he impress you, Dazai? Then, perish<lf>the thought of advancing, for the peril lying<lf>in wait would annihilate you.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650003_0130><lf>As for you, <pc_full>... I will admit,<lf>I did not expect you to make it this<lf>far. Clearly I underestimated you.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650004_0130><lf>However, I've received word that all contact with<lf>the Dominion has been lost. Regrettably, this<lf>confirms my suspicions of the danger ahead.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650005_0130><lf>Brave though you may be, hone your wit to its<lf>keenest edge should you intend to proceed.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650006_0130><lf>Dazai, now that you've confirmed <pc_family>'s<lf>well-being, I advise you to return to safety.
<chara 506><lf><voice E0650007_0060><lf>Okay, but... Listen, Master Archangel?
<chara 506><lf><voice E0650008_0060><lf>Once we take down the Demon King, Tokyo<lf>and the rest of the world will finally be safe, right?
<chara 506><lf><voice E0650009_0060><lf>In that case, let me help! Even if it does mean<lf>putting myself in danger, I'll give it everything I've got!
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650010_0130><lf>I understand you are eager to walk the path of<lf>righteousness in the service of our Lord. But<lf>good intent does not guarantee good outcome.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650011_0130><lf>Dazai. You are merely fodder for the Demon<lf>King's footsoldiers as you are now.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650012_0130><lf>Turning back here will surely save your<lf>life, and ease the heart of your friend.
<chara 506><lf><voice E0650013_0060><lf>Aw... I was hoping I could come with... but,<lf>she's right. I'd only end up getting in your way.
<chara 506><lf><voice E0650014_0060><lf>Guess I'll head back to the entrance and hold<lf>off any reinforcements. That oughta help some.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650015_0130><lf>Fear not. I shall escort him to the gate.
<chara 240><lf><voice E0650016_0130><lf>You go on ahead, Nahobino. Muster your forbidden<lf>power to its full extent and vanquish our sworn enemy.

<chara 82><lf><voice E0670001_0430><lf>Is this how I meet my end? Not by the archangel's<lf>sword, but the hands of a lowly servant...
<chara 82><lf><voice E0670002_0430><lf>Ah, but you are a Nahobino... So, we've seen<lf>firsthand why God forbade such power...
<chara 82><lf><voice E0670003_0430><lf>Hear me, Nahobino. Very soon, this age will meet<lf>its end. You alone have the right to usher in the next.
<chara 82><lf><voice E0670004_0430><lf>I urge you... Liberate yourself from God's<lf>shackles. Only freedom, born of chaos...<lf>can nurture this starving world.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0670005_0020><lf>And so the Demon King has fallen. <pc_given>,<lf>let us report to Bethel at the castle's entrance.
[NOT FOUND]
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675001_0140><lf>Good of you to wipe out Arioch for me.<lf>One less ugly sore to deal with.
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675002_0140><lf>With the Demon King out of the way, humanity's<lf>future just got a little bit brighter. Soon enough,<lf>we'll be on even footing with the demons.
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675003_0140><lf>Think about it. Your friends are human, yet they fight<lf>against demons—even pitting other demons against them.
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675004_0140><lf>If this doesn't spell a brighter<lf>future, I don't know what will.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0675005_0020><lf>If I may interject, only a select few can fend<lf>off demons. Those who can't—and that is a great<lf>many—will die. How does this profit humanity?
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675006_0140><lf>Speak only when you're addressed, Bethel construct.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0675007_0020><lf>As one created to protect humanity, particularly<lf>the vulnerable, I cannot condone your attitude.
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675008_0140><lf>Hmph, so says the slave to his programming.
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675009_0140><lf>Listen, without the will to fight, the will to<lf>live is meaningless. If someone can't fend for<lf>themselves, they're better off dead anyway.
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675010_0140><lf>Giving in to temptation, betraying one's fellow<lf>man... Anyone like that should've never been born.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0675011_0020><lf><pc_given> and I are in accord.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0675012_0020><lf>I presumed you were acting on behalf of<lf>all humanity. Perhaps I was mistaken.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0675013_0020><lf>What? I thought you were acting<lf>on behalf of all humanity...
<chara 503><lf><voice E0675014_0020><lf>I could ask the same of you.<lf>Did you not wish to save mankind?
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675015_0140><lf>...I need not answer the likes of you.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0675016_0150><lf>Ah, Yakumo, so this is where you were.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0675017_0150><lf>...Did something happen that I might wish to know?
<chara 512><lf><voice E0675018_0140><lf>Nothing important. Let's move.

<chara 530><lf><voice E2910001_0120><lf>So this is Shakan...<lf>I sense a peculiar presence here.<lf>We'd best proceed with caution.
[NOT FOUND]
<chara 635><lf><voice dev255_vo_80><lf>Ngh... Even if exhausted from our battle with<lf>the Demon King, how could we allow demons to<lf>break the barrier and enter these hallowed grounds...
<chara 636><lf><voice dev256_vo_73><lf>At this rate, they will surely reach the inner sanctum!
<chara 635><lf><voice dev255_vo_73><lf>There is no need to fear. Master Abdiel<lf>is guarding that consecrated chamber.
<chara 636><lf><voice dev256_vo_72><lf>Most reassuring. Does Ichiro Dazai remain her companion?<lf>He served us well in the battle against the Demon King.
<chara 635><lf><voice dev255_vo_72><lf>No... Shakan is a sacred space to the<lf>angelic host. The situation may be dire,<lf>but humans cannot be permitted to enter.
<chara 635><lf>As such, he is hunting down the remnants<lf>of the chaotic legions in Abdiel's stead.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_025><lf>Hmm... So the demons of chaos haven't given up, then.
<chara 635><lf><voice dev255_vo_74><lf>Who goes there!?
<chara 636><lf><voice dev256_vo_75><lf>Sneaking around, eavesdropping...<lf>Suspicious vermin, for your<lf>trespass you will receive only death!
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_013><lf>Foolish angels. We aren't even their enemy.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_032><lf>Regardless, our objective is to stop the<lf>one controlling Tiamat. We should hurry.
[NOT FOUND]
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_054><lf>Wait, I sense angels up ahead...<lf>Hold a moment and we'll listen to their conversation.
<chara 634><lf><voice dev254_vo_78><lf>What is the situation regarding the demon invaders?
<chara 635><lf><voice dev255_vo_77><lf>Sir, the demons are being dealt with. However,<lf>it appears the Saint is among the intruders...
<chara 634><lf><voice dev254_vo_77><lf>That cannot be... She must be after that power for herself.
<chara 634><lf>Accursed Saint... So this is how she betrays<lf>us after our master graciously spared her life.
<chara 634><lf><voice dev254_vo_75><lf>No one must be allowed to reach the inner sanctum!<lf>Make haste! We cannot let her profane this sacred space!
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_043><lf>We've avoided a fight for now...<lf>But what did they mean when they<lf>said the Saint is among the intruders?
It could be Yoko.
I think I know who.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_013><lf>What...? Explain yourself.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_011><lf>I don't believe it... So Hiromine<lf>was working for the Qadištu, and<lf>Isonokami died trying to save you...
<chara 530><lf>Based on what you've told me, it sounds like<lf>the key to reviving Tiamat was the dragonslayer<lf>Nahobino... in other words, you and Aogami.
<chara 530><lf>Which means, it's possible that Hiromine befriended<lf>you in order to report your activities to Lilith.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_044><lf>Now that I think about it, Eisheth abducting<lf>Atsuta's sister and forcing him to fight you wouldn't<lf>have made sense unless she knew about your friendship.
<chara 530><lf>So she was conspiring to trap you the entire time...<lf>all while trying to avoid drawing suspicion onto herself.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_045><lf>...Still, I don't believe everything about her was a lie.<lf>I suspect she may have felt some hesitation as well...
<chara 530><lf>In any case, given what we know now,<lf>it seems safe to say the Saint those<lf>angels were discussing is indeed Hiromine.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_032><lf>We don't know why she is here, but I'm concerned about<lf>that "power" they mentioned. We should hurry onward.
[NOT FOUND]
<chara 634><lf><voice dev260_vo_79><lf>Halt, infidel. You trespass upon sacred grounds.
<chara 634><lf>Ahead lies the path to the inner sanctum.<lf>No demon can be permitted to pass.<lf>Leave now, or be destroyed.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_010><lf>I don't think they can be reasoned with...<lf>We'll have to push through, <pc_full>.
<chara 634><lf><voice dev260_vo_76><lf>Guh... This power... You are the<lf>Nahobino of Bethel Japan! But your appearance<lf>does not match our reports...
<chara 634><lf>Your home is fading.<lf>Why do you stand against us?
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_021><lf>Now we can finally proceed.
Our home is fading?
Tokyo is going to disappear?
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_024><lf>...I'm sorry. I had no intention of hiding it,<lf>but I didn't have a chance to tell you.
<chara 530><lf>You are already aware the Tokyo you've always<lf>known is a miracle formed by the Creator.
<chara 530><lf>This miracle is known as the Shekinah Glory.<lf>You may have heard the name before.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_025><lf>However, we've recently confirmed that<lf>the power of the Shekinah Glory is waning,<lf>and Tokyo is beginning to disappear.
<chara 530><lf>This is likely a result of the Creator's<lf>defeat by the Lord of Chaos.
<chara 530><lf>In order to save Tokyo from dissipating,<lf>we need the power of a Nahobino.
<chara 530><lf><voice V0617n_045><lf>But there's no time to fully explain right now.<lf>We'll pick this up once we conclude our business here.
[NOT FOUND]
<chara 511><lf><voice E2930001_0130><lf>Impossible... How could I have fallen?
<chara 530><lf><voice E2930002_0120><lf>It's done, <pc_full>. That was well fought.
<chara 530><lf><voice E2930003_0120><lf>Hmm. I believe that was Yoko Hiromine we saw earlier.<lf>However, her presence did not feel entirely human...
<chara 530><lf><voice E2930004_0120><lf>Could she be the one guiding Tiamat,<lf>as Mastema had mentioned?
<chara 530><lf><voice E2930005_0120><lf>Perhaps it would be best to pay him another visit.

<chara 503><lf><voice E0425001_0020><lf>Dire circumstances indeed. I can see<lf>things have escalated in my absence.

<chara 503><lf><voice E0425002_0020><lf>I assuredly understand how you see it that way. However,<lf>make no mistake: we are fighting to protect your home,<lf>so I intend to do everything I can to assist you.

<chara 503><lf><voice E0425003_0020><lf>So you already grasp the reality of the matter? Well, you are<lf>correct—at the rate the demons' plot is unfolding, it truly<lf>was only a matter of time before they invaded.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0425011_0020><lf>Then, let us make our way to Jozoji.<lf>However, before we set out...
<chara 503><lf><voice E0425012_0020><lf>I'm detecting the presence of a<lf>powerful demon in that direction.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0425013_0020><lf>I advise we prepare before proceeding any further.
It was bound to happen eventually.

<chara 503><lf><voice E0761001_0020><lf><pc_given>, I'd like to ask you something.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761002_0020><lf>As a Nahobino, we can reach the Empyrean<lf>and seat ourselves upon the throne.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761003_0020><lf>Doing so will allow you to orchestrate the<lf>laws of the universe. In other words, you<lf>can manifest an entirely new world.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761004_0020><lf>So, should we reach the throne,<lf>what exactly do you intend to do?
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761005_0020><lf>I see. It's true, order is especially important<lf>in a war-torn reality such as this one.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761006_0020><lf>I see... I can only imagine how much more wondrous<lf>a world with even more possibilities would be.

<chara 503><lf><voice E0761007_0020><lf>I see... Humans are indeed the victims caught in the crossfire<lf>between the demons and gods. Perhaps providing them<lf>salvation is the correct course of action after all.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761008_0020><lf>I see. That's perfectly all right, though—there's no need to<lf>rush your answer. What say we search for one together?
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761009_0020><lf>This is rather strange, though—I feel as if something<lf>inside me is driving me forward, somehow.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761010_0020><lf>It's not the same as the responsibilities that a<lf>Proto-fiend feels upon creation, either. This is<lf>something that developed much later...
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761011_0020><lf>It almost feels like it's come from<lf>a place of higher power than Bethel.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761012_0020><lf>Ah, my apologies for speaking so strangely.<lf>Please forget my nonsense.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761013_0020><lf>As always, I know my purpose is to lend you<lf>my strength so you can carry out your will.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0761014_0020><lf>I want to ensure that you create your own destiny<lf>without a single regret. For this, I will do anything.
I'm not sure yet.

<chara 75><lf><voice E0762001_0150><lf>Ah, the prodigal child himself. Perhaps you could<lf>indulge me in a short chat? You needn't worry—I'm alone.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762002_0150><lf>You certainly share your humanity with Yakumo. But<lf>do you share his beliefs? Do you agree with his aims?
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762003_0150><lf>A most pleasant surprise! You're more<lf>perceptive than I gave you credit for.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762004_0150><lf>A shame. Then you, too, cannot see beyond his surface.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0762005_0020><lf>That man doesn't matter. It's you I have questions for.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0762006_0020><lf>Which side of this conflict do you stand on?<lf>Are you for the humans, or the demons?
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762007_0150><lf>I suppose I side with the humans. But surely a goddess can be<lf>partial to her own creations? Even if demoted to demonhood.
<chara 503><lf><voice E0762008_0020><lf>And you aim to seize the Throne of Creation?
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762009_0150><lf>Well, as a means to an end, certainly. To take it simply for<lf>power's sake would be a touch petty, don't you think?
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762010_0150><lf>Yakumo and I share a vision. It's why I lend him my power,<lf>and why I strive to see his world come to fruition.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762011_0150><lf>Ahah... Poor Yakumo's zealotry does tend to leave a bad<lf>impression. But what nobility in his soul, in his aims...
<chara 503><lf><voice E0762012_0020><lf>As far as I can tell, he doesn't even trust his fellow man.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762013_0150><lf>A most shallow appraisal, my dear. Yakumo loves<lf>his fellow man, perhaps more than any other.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762014_0150><lf>He rejects humans who have given up, precisely<lf>because he believes in humanity's potential for<lf>strength. Do you understand, child?
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762015_0150><lf>Yes, I rather thought you might.<lf>You and he are alike in many ways.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762016_0150><lf>I suppose that's only to be expected. Few truly do.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762017_0150><lf>Those of the Yakumo family have always been<lf>officers of the law, you see. Would-be agents<lf>of justice, living to protect the meek.
<chara 75><lf><voice E0762018_0150><lf>His mother was a medium. She helped<lf>those tormented by dark spirits.
